content.text:
# List of Senegalese Grammy Award winners and nominees

The following is a list of Grammy Awards winners and nominees from Senegal:
{| class="wikitable sortable"
! Year !! Category !! Nominees(s) !! Nominated for !! Result
|-
| 1993 || rowspan=4|Best World Music Album || rowspan=2|Youssou N'Dour || Eyes Open ||
|-
| 1995 || The Guide ||
|-
| 1996 || Baaba Maal || ''Firin' in Fouta'' ||
|-
| 2001 || rowspan=2|Youssou N'Dour || Joko: The Link ||
|-
| rowspan=2|2004 || rowspan=4|Best Contemporary World Music Album || ''Nothing's In Vain (Coono du Réér) ||
|-
| Orchestra Baobab || Specialist in All Styles'' ||
|-
| 2005 || rowspan =2|Youssou N'Dour|| Egypt ||
|-
| 2009 || Rokku Mi Rokka ||
|-
|}
